MajorClaims.Text: it is good for a teenager to do a part time job while he/she is still a student
part time job will be good for students

Claims.Text: it can destruct students from their study
students can learn lots of things from part time job, before starting their real job
from part time jobs students can earn money, which can help their parents

Premises.Text: i did part time job in my high school and it did not hurt my academic result
Students can learn about time management, money management and convince people by their words
when I was in my high school I worked as a sales-man in a shop for a year
i had to manage my time efficiently
As i had to spend some of my time in my job
I had to manage my boss as well as had to prepare my homework
This taught me how to manage time efficiently and do any job quickly and effectively
When my boss was out of the shop, i had to manage the accounts section of the shop
From this i learned, how to manage money correctly
This experience taught me, doing part time job can help students to learn many things
part time job can help students earn money and which can help their parents financially
By tutoring them, i earned some money and bought me books with it
after taking that part time job i stopped taking my pocket money form my parents
